name: GREENE COUNTY and Greene County Children and Youth Services, Respondents, v. DISTRICT 2, UNITED MINE WORKERS OF AMERICA and Local Union 9999, United Mine Workers of America, Petitioners
name_abbreviation: Greene County v. District 2, United Mine Workers of America

parties: GREENE COUNTY and Greene County Children and Youth Services, Respondents, v. DISTRICT 2, UNITED MINE WORKERS OF AMERICA and Local Union 9999, United Mine Workers of America, Petitioners.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 1st day of December, 2000, we hereby GRANT the Petition for Allowance of Appeal.
It is hereby further ORDERED that the Order of the Commonwealth Court is VACATED.
We REMAND this matter to the Commonwealth Court for reconsideration in light of our decision in State System of Higher Education (Cheyney University) v. State College University Professional Association (PSEA-NEA), 560 Pa. 135, 743 A.2d 405 (1999).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
761 A.2d 1180
GREENE COUNTY and Greene County Children and Youth Services, Respondents, v. DISTRICT 2, UNITED MINE WORKERS OF AMERICA and Local Union 9999, United Mine Workers of America, Petitioners.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 1, 2000.
